products.title: Lana Mineral 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their beautiful lana range really creates that wow factor for an affordable price and is available in a range of on-trend colours with an attractive pattern. This blue vertical blind is perfect to add a stylish splash of colour to your room whilst also creating a cool hue. Product id: sdb-vtb0958 fabric colour: mineral material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes lana mineral 89mm vertical blind in blue.

products.title: Dragonfly Mineral Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Bring nature into your home with the azure mineral blue roman blind. The serious deep tones of this linen mix blind are balanced with a buoyant sketch of dragonflies to add the perfect dynamic to your home. Weve prepared the blind from a delicious weave of cotton and linen so its suitable for wherever you choose to hang it. Product id: db-rom1087 fabric colour: mineral blue material: 90% cotton 10% linen lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Bumblebee Mineral Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Hang this linen mix blind against bright ochre walls, or deep blues and greys for an entirely distinct effect. You can choose to hang this in any room, whether it be an office or hallway, down to more humid rooms such as bathrooms and kitchens because weve manufactured the bumblebee mineral blue roman blind from a marvellous combination of cotton and linen to ensure the fabric breathes whilst holding ample folds.

products.title: Monkeying Around Mineral - Roman Blind
products.description: On a stone grey background sit black and white monkeys upon turquoise and white foliage, and this tropical display is the monkeying around in mineral. The ornately drawn leaves add a pretty touch, whilst the monkeys have a sense of fun and character. Use the mineral to give your downstairs cloakroom a colourful lift, going for a vibrant turquoise feature wall if you dare, and keeping the remainder of the room painted white.

products.title: Dragonfly Mineral Blue Curtain
products.description: Their dragonfly range, inspired by the same winged water insect, combined modern design with contemporary trend shades to create this a highly sought-after fabric. This mineral blue dragonfly curtain, in a soft blue colour, makes this muted curtain a must for insect-lovers. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to adorn, you can be confident that this dragonfly mineral blue curtain is suitable.

products.title: Bumblebee Mineral Blue Curtain
products.description: Their bumblebee range mixes patterns inspired by a traditional favourite of english gardeners, and contemporary shades. Classic traditional design, on a soft sky blue background makes this bumblebee curtain a must for nature-lovers and keen gardeners alike. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to enliven, you can be confident that this bumblebee mineral blue curtain is suitable.

products.title: Mineral Solar Iron Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Their mineral pleated fabric is a woven, textured fabric with subtle splashes of colour making this fabric truly unique. Perfect for adding a softer look to your loft, kitchen or conservatory. Product id: db-pls0126 fabric colour: iron material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric. Control type: pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention light filtering: yes mineral solar iron pleated skylight blind in grey.
